parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To put to the test, make trial of, tempt, try. From ek and peirazo; to test thoroughly.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To try, tempt, test. From peira; to test, i.e. Endeavor, scrutinize, entice, discipline.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
Probably from optanomai; a snake, figuratively, an artful malicious person, especially Satan.
